page.title: 17SHOPS AND OFFICES
page.content: Changes that have taken place on our boundary road-A355(The Broadway/Parade -F.C).Here is a list of shops that exist today.......... 1.A.C Frost&Co.,Estate Agents 2.Nat.West Bank 3.Noel Gregory,Art 4.Antiques 5.Oscar's Restaurant 6.Printing Agency 7.Halifax B.S.Raffety Buckland,Est.Ag. 8.Elizabeth Rose-Dress shop 9.Fineweave Carpets 10.Anthony Paul Jewellery 11.The Handyman-D.I.Y shop 12.Peter Dominic-Wine Shop 13.Abbey National-Building Society 14.Anglia-Building Society 15.H&L Harrod-Plumber 16.Private House 17.Maurice Lund-Greengrocer 18.Steven Rich-Shoe shop
